name: Marble Muncher
description:
A simple game about mini planets that look like Marbles.  Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam number 2.  This is my first completed game and first GameJam entry!

How to Play

Navigate your ship using the mini map to find those Marble planets, then gulp up their resources until the solar system is all gulped up!  Then move on to the next.

Avoid the Planets, they hurt! And don't run in to the Sun, it burns!

Watch out, the Planets fight back!

Watch your energy Bar though, you don't want to run out of energy at the wrong time!

Controls

Use the cursor keys to rotate and move forward.

Use C to enable the tractor beam to suck the resources out of the Marbles.

P.S.  This was rushed to get it in before the deadline.  Graphics are not the best and still prototype in some cases. Mechanics mostly work but some areas are a little buggy still and I learnt one serious thing....SCOPE CREEP is a thing! And as a 1 man team, that became a big issue!
